newsitem.title: UK: Tesco prices 250 mln stg 10-year bond.
newsitem.headline: Tesco prices 250 mln stg 10-year bond.

text.p: The following bond has been priced, lead manager UBS said. BORROWER TESCO PLC
TYPE STRAIGHT ISS PRICE 98.957 PAY DATE 30.JUL.97
MOODY AA3 LISTING LONDON PAY FREQ ANNUAL
IBCA AA- DENOMS (K) 1-10-100 SALE LIMITS US/GB
NEG PLG YES CRS DEFLT YES FORCE MAJ IPMA 2
GOV LAW ENGLISH HOME CTRY UK TAX PROVS =
UNDERLYING GOVT BOND 7.25 PCT 2007 GILT NOTES ISSUED OFF MTN PROGRAMME
